description:
A Windows/Mac application that validates and confirms that the recordings and screenshots made by Synology Surveillance Station have not been tampered with since its original recording.

Synology Evidence Integrity Authenticator is a Windows/Mac application that validates and confirms that the recordings and screenshots made by Synology Surveillance Station have not been tampered with since its original recording. Other than approve the recordingsâ€™ embedded digital signature, this tool also display the exact recording time and DiskStation serial number.
Fixed Issues
1. Minor bug fixes.
